title: @Riot Dragon trainer tristana has ms buff special animation?

embed.description: In this introductory video guide, Dragon Trainer Tristana and Riggle teach you the basics of combat and how to avoid inconveniences such as minor burns, major burns, scale slime, upset stomach, and fiery annihilation.

body:
At least this is what it looks like at 1:00 , can someone confirm that. If it is the case ,what are the exact requirements? 
Is there other champs/skins with this feature( animation change from an external ms buff ,so personal buff like on volibear and lulu doesn't count)
 also is there a plan to add this kind of things to more champions/skins bc as a support that loves  talisman of ascension , I find this super cool and awesome.

replies.body:
She has a unique Homeguard animation. ^-^ Since she's a legendary skin, she gets some cool bells and whistles like that!

We currently don't plans to retro-grant champions/skins unique animations if they don't have them, but it's something we can consider for content in the future.
So it's only for homeguard, but it makes sense. Thank you for your answer. Also kudos to everyone that worked on that skin,it's amazing
